alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 6:24PM EDT until July 03 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Sullivan County in central New York... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 624 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Highland Lake, or 11 miles northwest of Port Jervis, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Haven, Highland Lake, Hartwood, Glen Spey, Rock Hill, Mt Prosper, Mongaup Valley Wildlife Area, Forestburgh, Basha Kill and Oakland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
